root.name: ABM
root.description: Overview In ABM, the player is tasked with defending a planet from incoming missiles. Using the mouse, the player can launch anti-ballistic missile missiles in order to destroy the incoming projectiles. The enemy attacks come in waves, where each level is somewhat more difficult than its predecessor. The objective of the game is to establish a high score.This game was released for the PC platform and is controlled using the mouse and keyboard.
